languages.text: "Категоризация верна. Объект является мерзостью и грехом, опасно приблизившейся к сотворению анафемы Изуверского Интеллекта".
"The categorisation is correct. The object is a perversion and an outrage, one dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Abominable Intelligence."
languages.original_text: "Категоризация верна. Объект является мерзостью и грехом, опасно приблизившейся к сотворению анафемы Изуверского Интеллекта".

traits.locale_text: "The categorization is correct. The object is a blasphemous abomination, dangerously close to the creation of the anathematized Soulless Sentience."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The categorization is correct. The object is a blasphemous abomination, dangerously close to the creation of the anathematized Soulless Sentience."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a blasphemous abomination, dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Soulless Sentience."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a blasphemous abomination, dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Soulless Sentience."

traits.locale_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a perversion and an outrage, one dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Abominable Intelligence."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a perversion and an outrage, one dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Abominable Intelligence."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「その分類は正しい。この物体は倒錯であり、暴挙であり、忌まわしき知能の創造に危険なほど近づいている」
languages.original_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a perversion and an outrage, one dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Abominable Intelligence."

traits.locale_text: 「その分類は正しい。この物体は倒錯であり、暴挙であり、忌まわしき知能の創造に危険なほど近づいている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这样的分类是正确的。这台机械确实是亵渎神灵的可憎造物，非常接近受到诅咒的憎恶智能。”
languages.original_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a perversion and an outrage, one dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Abominable Intelligence."

traits.locale_text: “这样的分类是正确的。这台机械确实是亵渎神灵的可憎造物，非常接近受到诅咒的无魂造物。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La categorización es correcta. El objeto es una perversión, un ultraje peligrosamente cercano a la creación de la anatematizada Inteligencia Abominable».
languages.original_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a perversion and an outrage, one dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Abominable Intelligence."

traits.locale_text: «La categorización es correcta. El objeto es una abominación, peligrosamente cercana a la creación de la anatematizada Conciencia Sin Alma».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Kategorisierung ist korrekt. Das Objekt ist eine Perversion, ein Frevel, der der Erschaffung der als Anathema eingestuften Abscheulichen Intelligenz nahekommt."
languages.original_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a perversion and an outrage, one dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Abominable Intelligence."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kategorisierung ist korrekt. Das Objekt ist eine blasphemische Abscheulichkeit, gefährlich nah an der Erschaffung der als Anathema eingestuften Seelenlosen Intelligenz."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette catégorisation est exacte. Le sujet est une perversion et un outrage, dangereusement proche de la création de l'Intelligence Abominable anathémisée. »
languages.original_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a perversion and an outrage, one dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Abominable Intelligence."

traits.locale_text: « Cette catégorisation est correcte. Le sujet est une abomination impie, dangereusement proche de la création de la Conscience sans âme anathémisée. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu sınıflandırma doğru. Bu özne, bir çarpıklık ve hakaret. Yasaklanmış Yezit Zekâ'nın yaratımlarına tehlikeli derecede yakın."
languages.original_text: "The categorisation is correct. The object is a perversion and an outrage, one dangerously close to the creation of the anathematised Abominable Intelligence."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kategorizasyon doğru. Bu özne bir sapıklık ve bir hakaret. Yasaklanmış Yezit Zekâ'nın yaratımına tehlikeli derecede yakın."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
